law.catch_line: Witnesses, subpoenas and coercion of attendance.
law.text: The court may issue subpoenas for witnesses at the request of either party, and their attendance and testifying may be coerced by the court which conducts the inquest.
law.history: Amended 1978 Ky. Acts ch. 384, sec. 111, effective June 17, 1978. -- Amended 1976 (1st Extra. Sess.) Ky. Acts ch. 14, sec. 314, effective January 2, 1978. -- Transferred 1952 Ky. Acts ch. 84, sec. 1, effective July 1, 1953, from C.C. sec. 458.
